Comment 2: 
Thanks for pointing this out.
The rest of the references are in 8c, 8g, 8l, and 
the hand-written 386 assembly files.  It will require

already requires code sequences like this. 
It's not a small change, but it's probably worth doing for Xen.
Thanks for the report.
